name: THE REDCLIFFE AERO CLUB
about: The Redcliffe Aero Club is a premier aviation training organization based in North Brisbane and South East Queensland. We offer a modern fleet of Cessna aircraft and provide high-quality flight training, including aviation diploma courses. Our competitive rates and professional instructors make us an ideal choice for aspiring pilots. The club hosts various events, such as monthly BBQs and member flyaways, and is approved as a VET Student Loan Provider. Join us for a Trial Instructional Flight to start your journey to becoming a pilot, and enjoy scenic flights and member hire opportunities with our well-maintained aircraft. We are dedicated to providing a comprehensive and supportive learning environment for all our students. Start your aviation career with the Redcliffe Aero Club today.
services:
["Trial Flights
Recreational Pilot License
